abstract: It seems easy enough to add images into a Microsoft Word file, but how can these graphics be pasted down so that they do not slip all over the place when text is added?
snippet: It seems easy enough to add images into a Microsoft Word file, but how can these graphics be pasted down so that they do not slip all over the place when text is added?
lead_paragraph: Q. It seems easy enough to add images into a Microsoft Word file, but how can these graphics be pasted down so that they do not slip all over the place when text is added?

abstract: Two new digital pens don’t need special paper to write on. But there are a few glitches.
snippet: Two new digital pens don’t need special paper to write on. But there are a few glitches.
lead_paragraph: In gadget-head circles, one of this summer’s most buzzworthy new products is the Pulse pen: a ballpoint that simultaneously records both your handwriting and the sound of the words you are transcribing. Both are transferred to a Windows PC when you return home  seemingly perfect for lecture-hall students, journalists and note-takers of any kind.

headline.main: Digital Pens to Write on Any Paper
headline.print_headline: Digital Pens To Write On Any Paper

abstract: Microsoft and Yahoo have been holding separate talks with other potential media partners after their negotiations with each other broke down, Reuters reported citing unnamed sources.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft and Yahoo have been holding separate talks with other potential media partners after their negotiations with each other broke down, Reuters reported citing unnamed sources.

headline.main: Microsoft, Yahoo Mull Media Partner Options: Sources

abstract: A document in the settled Facebook ConnectU litigation reveals that Facebook’s common shares are worth a quarter of the value of the stock Microsoft purchased when it invested in the social network.
snippet: A document in the settled Facebook ConnectU litigation reveals that Facebook’s common shares are worth a quarter of the value of the stock Microsoft purchased when it invested in the social network.
lead_paragraph: There has been some speculation recently about what is being called an “internal Facebook” valuation – a value the company has assigned to its own common stock that is dramatically lower than the $15 billion valuation set so publicly last year by Microsoft’s investment.
